eateries.name: 104West!
eateries.about:
Located next to the Center for Jewish Living building on the south edge of west campus, 104West! is Cornell's kosher and multicultural All You Care To Eat dining room. Menus are prepared under the supervision of STAR-K (meat and pareve) and STAR-D (dairy) Kosher Certifications, and Jewish dietary laws are strictly followed with the direction of a resident "Mashgiach," or kosher-food supervisor.

You don't have to keep kosher to enjoy the menu–come sample traditional kosher entrees and enjoy mouth-watering ethnic and international options with a kosher flair. Dining options also include Halal, Seventh-day Adventist, vegetarian, vegan, and other diets.

More Info: 104West!
eateries.aboutshort: Cornell's kosher and multicultural All You Care To Eat dining room is STAR-K and STAR-D certified.

eateryTypes.descr: All You Care To Eat Dining Room

payMethods.descr: Meal Plan - Debit Plans (Big Red Bucks, Meal Choice, etc)

eateries.name: Amit Bhatia Libe Café
eateries.about:
A combined effort between Cornell Dining and Olin Library, the Amit Bhatia Libe Café serves specialty Starbucks coffees, smoothies, pastries, and Freshtake Grab-n-Go sandwiches, salads, and snacks.

Sunday through Wednesday nights the café stays open until midnight to accommodate late-night studiers.

More Info: Amit Bhatia Libe Café
eateries.aboutshort: The perfect place to take a study break, or to enjoy a latte and a pastry while you enjoy wireless Internet access on your laptop.

payMethods.descr: Meal Plan - Debit Plans (Big Red Bucks, Meal Choice, etc)

eateries.name: Atrium Café
eateries.about:
The Atrium Café's coffee kiosk proudly serves Starbucks specialty coffee, pastries, and Grab-n-Go items, with extended hours. The coffee kiosk opens weekdays at 7am, and closes at 5pm Monday through Wednesday, 4pm Thursday, and 2pm Friday.

More Info: Atrium Café
eateries.aboutshort: The Atrium Café is located in historic Sage Hall, home to the Johnson Graduate School of Management. Coffee kiosk is open extended hours!

payMethods.descr: Meal Plan - Debit Plans (Big Red Bucks, Meal Choice, etc)

diningItems.descr: Deli - Hot and Cold Deli Sandwiches

eateries.name: Bear Necessities Grill & C-Store
eateries.about:
The grill serves up deluxe burgers, hot chicken sandwiches, delicious french fries, and other mouth-watering comfort foods. You can also order 5 Star Subs and homemade pizza. Bear Necessities also has a convenience store with staple food, beverages and household items.

Please note: During the summer, the deli and salad counter is closed, and the grill closes at 2pm Monday through Friday.

More Info: Bear Necessities
eateries.aboutshort: Bear Necessities is a convenience store and grill located on the first floor of Robert Purcell Community Center on north campus.

payMethods.descr: Meal Plan - Debit Plans (Big Red Bucks, Meal Choice, etc)

eateries.name: Becker House Dining Room
eateries.about:
The Becker House Dining Room is an All You Care To Eat dining room for house residents, and for the entire Cornell community. This eatery serves continental breakfast on weekdays, brunch/lunch on weekends, and dinner seven nights a week.

More Info: Becker House Dining Room
eateries.aboutshort: All You Care To Eat dining room located in Carl Becker House on West Campus.

eateries.name: Big Red Barn
eateries.about:
The Big Red Barn is a cozy café with a delicious breakfast and lunch menu. It also serves as Cornell's on-campus social center for graduate and professional students. Relax at outdoor picnic tables, or sit inside by the fireplace in comfortable lounge furniture.

More Info: Big Red Barn
eateries.aboutshort: Once a carriage house, the Big Red Barn is now a cozy café with a delicious breakfast and lunch menu.

payMethods.descr: Meal Plan - Debit Plans (Big Red Bucks, Meal Choice, etc)

eateries.name: Bus Stop Bagels
eateries.about:
Bus Stop Bagels, next to the Trillium food court in Kennedy Hall, gets fresh bagels delivered twice a day from Ithaca Bakery with all the usual toppings and a great selection of house sandwiches, plus Starbucks coffee drinks and snack foods.

More Info: Bus Stop Bagels
eateries.aboutshort: Bagels for breakfast, bagels for lunch, bagels to go!

payMethods.descr: Meal Plan - Debit Plans (Big Red Bucks, Meal Choice, etc)

eateries.name: Café Jennie
eateries.about:
Located in The Cornell Store, Café Jennie is named for Jennie McGraw, the daughter of John McGraw, a wealthy industrialist and a founding Cornell Trustee. Stop by for a Peet's Coffee, delicious Cheesecake Factory baked goods, and a mouth-watering array of sandwiches and wraps.

More Info: Café Jennie
eateries.aboutshort: A café and sandwich/pastry shop located in The Cornell Store.

payMethods.descr: Meal Plan - Debit Plans (Big Red Bucks, Meal Choice, etc)

eateries.name: Carol's Café
eateries.about:
Come visit Carol's Café and enjoy a menu featuring specialty coffee from Starbucks, smoothies, hot daily soup selections, sushi, fresh fruit and snacks, Freshtake Grab-n-Go sandwiches and salads, delicious pastries and baked goods and more.

More Info: Carol's Café
eateries.aboutshort: Warm, inviting café at Carol Tatkon Center open to the whole campus community.

eateries.name: Cook House Dining Room
eateries.about:
The Cook House Dining Room is an All You Care To Eat dining room for house residents, and for the entire Cornell community. The eatery serves hot breakfast on weekdays, brunch/lunch on weekends, and dinner seven nights a week.

More Info: Cook House Dining Room
eateries.aboutshort: All You Care To Eat dining room located in Alice Cook House on West Campus.

eateries.name: Cornell Dairy Bar
eateries.about:
In the beautifully renovated Stocking Hall on the east end of Tower Road, the Cornell Dairy Bar is a great place for breakfast, coffee, or even sweet treat like Cornell ice cream, sundaes and floats. Regular hours vary seasonally, especially weekend hours, so please check the specific hours on this page for updates.

More Info: Cornell Dairy Bar
eateries.aboutshort: In the renovated Stocking Hall, the Cornell Dairy features a variety of delicious Cornell Dairy ice cream, sundaes, and floats.

payMethods.descr: Meal Plan - Debit Plans (Big Red Bucks, Meal Choice, etc)

diningItems.descr: Coffee Bar - Finger Lakes Specialty Coffees

eateries.name: Franny's
eateries.about: One of Cornell's newest eateries is Franny's, a food truck named for a beloved Architecture alumna, located between Milstein and Sibley Halls. You'll find a unique mix of Pan-Asian sandwiches, rice bowls and ramen, bao buns and fries, as well as refreshing Asian-inspired drinks.
eateries.aboutshort: Franny's is a food truck named for a beloved Architecture alumna, located between Milstein and Sibley Halls, featuring a unique mix of Asian-inspired cuisine.

payMethods.descr: Meal Plan - Debit Plans (Big Red Bucks, Meal Choice, etc)

eateries.name: Goldie's Café
eateries.about:
Goldie's is a great location on Central Campus for breakfast, lunch, or a mid-day snack. Signature sandwiches – some served on German-style pretzel rolls – have become customer favorites, and a wide array of Freshtake Grab-n-Go items, snacks, and desserts are always on the menu.

More Info: Goldie's Café
eateries.aboutshort: Conveniently located in the Physical Sciences Building on Central Campus.

payMethods.descr: Meal Plan - Debit Plans (Big Red Bucks, Meal Choice, etc)

eateries.name: Green Dragon
eateries.about:
Stop by the Green Dragon and enjoy a hot specialty Finger Lakes Coffee Roasters coffee, Freshtake Grab-n-Go sandwiches and salads, kosher items, and delicious desserts.

More Info: Green Dragon
eateries.aboutshort: A hot spot on central campus, especially for the students, faculty, and staff of College of Architecture, Art and Planning.

diningItems.descr: Coffee Bar - Finger Lakes Specialty Coffees

eateries.name: Hot Dog Cart
eateries.about:
Cornell Dining's Hot Dog Cart is usually open outside Day Hall on summer weekdays when weather permits. On special occasions, the Hot Dog Cart may be elsewhere on campus. Keep an eye on Cornell Dining's Facebook and Twitter for updates.

More Info: Hot Dog Cart
eateries.aboutshort: Enjoy lunch al fresco when weather permits, choosing an all-beef hot dog or vegetarian (tofu) hot dog.

eateries.name: Ice Cream Cart
eateries.about: Fresh Cornell Dairy ice cream at Cornell Dining's Summer Ice Cream Cart on the Ag Quad outside Kennedy Hall's Call Auditorium weekdays, and on the Arts Quad for Cornell's summer concert series. At Stocking Hall on August 15th.
eateries.aboutshort: Fresh Cornell Dairy ice cream on the Ag Quad outside Kennedy Hall weekdays, and on the Arts Quad for Cornell's summer concert series. At Stocking Hall on August 15th.
eateries.opHoursDescr: Weekday middays for the summer, and Friday evenings for Cornell's concert series.

eateries.name: Ivy Room
eateries.about:
The Ivy Room food court includes the Ivy Grill with made-to-order American classics like all-day omelets and burgers, plus the Straight From the Garden station featuring design-your-own-salads. New to the Ivy Room is Bamboo, showcasing Pan-Asian cuisine such as Vietnamese, Korean, and Thai specialties.

More Info: Ivy Room
eateries.aboutshort: Ivy Room is a food court in Willard Straight Hall with a historic dining-hall eating area decorated with crests and seals.

payMethods.descr: Meal Plan - Debit Plans (Big Red Bucks, Meal Choice, etc)

eateries.name: Jansen's Dining Room at Bethe House
eateries.about:
Jansen's Dining Room at Bethe House is an All You Care To Eat dining room for house residents, and for the entire Cornell community. Chef Jacob Kuehn puts together exciting new menus throughout the year. This eatery serves continental breakfast on weekdays, brunch/lunch on weekends, and dinner seven nights a week.

More Info: Jansen's Dining Room at Bethe House
eateries.aboutshort: All You Care To Eat dining room located in Hans Bethe House on West Campus.

eateryTypes.descr: All You Care To Eat Dining Room

eateries.name: Jansen's Market
eateries.about:
In addition to an array of snacks, beverages, fresh and frozen take-away meals, household items, and pharmacy and beauty supplies, Jansen's Market also serve Starbucks coffee, bubble tea, smoothies, pastries, frozen yogurt, and Dreamfactory cheesecake.

More Info: Jansen's Market
eateries.aboutshort: Full-service convenience store located on the first floor of Noyes Community Recreation Center on West Campus.

eateries.name: Keeton House Dining Room
eateries.about:
The Keeton House Dining Room is an All You Care To Eat dining room for house residents, and for the entire Cornell community. Sample Chef Nery's unique menu offerings in the entrée station, Asian station, grill, deli, and salad bar. This eatery serves hot breakfast on weekdays, brunch/lunch on weekends, and dinner seven nights a week.

More Info: Keeton House Dining Room
eateries.aboutshort: All You Care To Eat dining room located in William Keeton House on West Campus.

eateries.name: Martha's Express
eateries.about:
Martha's Express, in Martha Van Rensselaer Hall, offers made-to-order grain and salad bowls, prepared signature bowls, and grab-and-go items in the west corridor off the MVR Commons while the building is under renovation. Martha's Café will return when the building is complete!

More Info: Martha's Café
eateries.aboutshort: There's something for everyone at Martha's Café.

payMethods.descr: Meal Plan - Debit Plans (Big Red Bucks, Meal Choice, etc)

diningItems.descr: Coffee Bar - Finger Lakes Specialty Coffees

eateries.name: Mattin's Café
eateries.about:
You’ll find Mattin's Café in the atrium of Duffield Hall, adjacent to Phillips Hall on the Engineering Quad. Enjoy made-to-order deli sandwiches, boneless wings, hot Starbucks coffee, Freshtake Grab-n-Go items, soups, kosher items, mouth-watering pastries and more.

More Info: Mattin's Café
eateries.aboutshort: Popular with engineers and a go to spot in the stunning atrium of Duffield Hall.

payMethods.descr: Meal Plan - Debit Plans (Big Red Bucks, Meal Choice, etc)

diningItems.descr: Deli - Hot and Cold Deli Sandwiches

eateries.name: McCormick's at Moakley House
eateries.about:
McCormick's at Moakley House offers a casual environment close to campus, open daily through the season. Treat a campus visitor to an impeccably served luncheon, stop for refreshments after a round of golf, meet coworkers at the end of the day for a burger and a beer, or bring the family for a relaxing weekend brunch. Named for Jack McCormick, a varsity golfer from the Cornell Class of 1957 whose will included a bequest to modernize Moakley House, this eatery alongside the award-winning Robert Trent Jones Golf Course at Cornell University isn't just for golfers. It's open to the public and has plenty of parking, and we welcome everyone for a drink, a snack, or a meal.

More Info: McCormick's at Moakley House
eateries.aboutshort: Named for Jack McCormick, a varsity golfer from the Cornell Class of 1957, McCormick's is open to the public and has plenty of parking.

payMethods.descr: Meal Plan - Debit Plans (Big Red Bucks, Meal Choice, etc)

eateries.name: North Star Dining Room
eateries.about:
The North Star Dining Room is an All You Care To Eat dining room for house residents, and for the entire Cornell community. Enjoy an open kitchen concept and numerous unique food stations serving a huge variety of ethnic and regional American cuisine.

More Info: North Star Dining Room
eateries.aboutshort: All You Care To Eat dining room located in Appel Commons on North Campus.

eateries.name: Okenshields
eateries.about:
Okenshields is an All You Care To Eat dining room for house residents, and for the entire Cornell community. With hundreds of menu options to choose from – from an Asian station to a healthy foods bar featuring whole grain salads and cut fruit – you're sure to find something that meets your fancy.

More Info: Okenshields
eateries.aboutshort: All You Care To Eat dining room located in Willard Straight Hall on Central Campus.

eateries.name: Risley Dining Room
eateries.about:
Risley Dining Room is a 100% gluten-free, tree-nut-free, and peanut-free All You Care To Eat dining room for house residents, and for the entire Cornell community. Modeled after the Christchurch Refectory at Oxford University, the dining room maintains the same Gothic charm as when it first opened as the all-Ivy "Risley Great Hall" in 1913.

More Info: Risley Dining Room
eateries.aboutshort: All You Care To Eat dining room located in Risley Residential College on North Campus.
eateries.nutrition: Risley Dining Room is certified 100% gluten-free, tree-nut-free, and peanut-free. Thank you for not bringing outside food into Risley!

eateryTypes.descr: All You Care To Eat Dining Room

eateries.name: Robert Purcell Marketplace Eatery
eateries.about:
The Robert Purcell Marketplace Eatery is an award-winning All You Care To Eat dining room with a huge variety of menu options. Chef Kevin Moore, who has been with Cornell Dining for over 25 years, most recently at 104West!, plans creative menus with roots in a variety of international traditions.

More Info: Robert Purcell Marketplace Eatery
eateries.aboutshort: All You Care To Eat dining room located in Robert Purcell Community Center on North Campus.

eateryTypes.descr: All You Care To Eat Dining Room

eateries.name: Rose House Dining Room
eateries.about:
The Rose House Dining Room is an All You Care To Eat dining room for house residents, and for the entire Cornell community. This eatery features traditional hot entrees, an Asian station, a grill, a deli, and a salad bar. Sample Chef Daniel Czebiniak's daily menu options – you won't be disappointed!

More Info: Rose House Dining Room
eateries.aboutshort: All You Care To Eat dining room located in Flora Rose House on West Campus.

eateryTypes.descr: All You Care To Eat Dining Room

eateries.name: Rusty's
eateries.about:
Conveniently located in the lobby of Uris Hall, Rusty's offers Starbucks specialty coffees, Straight from the Oven baked goods, Freshtake Grab-n-Go sandwiches, salads and more. At any time of day, you're sure to find something to whet your appetite!

More Info: Rusty's
eateries.aboutshort: A great place to grab a quick coffee or a bite to eat on your way to class or work.

payMethods.descr: Meal Plan - Debit Plans (Big Red Bucks, Meal Choice, etc)

eateries.name: Straight from the Market
eateries.about: With a farm-fresh marketplace flair, Straight from the Market offers a wide variety of fresh and marinated vegetables, hummus and tapenade bar, salad fixings, and Cornell Dairy ice cream on the main floor of Willard Straight Hall adjacent to the Straight Terrace. Healthy, flavorful, and ready-to-go meat, vegan, and vegetarian choices daily.
eateries.aboutshort: A farm-fresh marketplace on the main floor of the Straight.

payMethods.descr: Meal Plan - Debit Plans (Big Red Bucks, Meal Choice, etc)

eateries.name: Trillium
eateries.about:
At Trillium choose from a wide variety of food stations serving Mexican food, Asian dishes, sumptuous burgers, pasta bar, sandwiches, salads, soups, and made-to-order omelets, among many other delectable menu options.

More Info: Trillium
eateries.aboutshort: Located in Kennedy Hall in the heart of Central Campus, Trillium is one of our most popular food courts.
